statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 11 \\ -6 \\ 3 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ 2 \\ -9 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
